info.title: DeviceServices
info.description: Use this API to manage the Windows IoT device services in your Azure subscription.

get.description: Lists all of the available Windows IoT Services REST API operations.

post.description: Check if a Windows IoT Device Service name is available.

requestBody.description: Set the name parameter in the DeviceServiceCheckNameAvailabilityParameters structure to the name of the Windows IoT Device Service to check.

get.description: Get all the IoT hubs in a subscription.
Get all the IoT hubs in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the Windows IoT Device Service.

get.description: Get the non-security related metadata of a Windows IoT Device Service.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the Windows IoT Device Service.

parameters.name: deviceName
parameters.description: The name of the Windows IoT Device Service.

put.summary: Create or update the metadata of a Windows IoT Device Service.
put.description: Create or update the metadata of a Windows IoT Device Service. The usual pattern to modify a property is to retrieve the Windows IoT Device Service metadata and security metadata, and then combine them with the modified values in a new body to update the Windows IoT Device Service.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the Windows IoT Device Service.

parameters.name: deviceName
parameters.description: The name of the Windows IoT Device Service.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the Windows IoT Device Service. Do not specify for creating a new Windows IoT Device Service. Required to update an existing Windows IoT Device Service.

requestBody.description: The Windows IoT Device Service metadata and security metadata.

delete.description: Delete a Windows IoT Device Service.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the Windows IoT Device Service.

parameters.name: deviceName
parameters.description: The name of the Windows IoT Device Service.

patch.summary: Updates the metadata of a Windows IoT Device Service.
patch.description: Updates the metadata of a Windows IoT Device Service. The usual pattern to modify a property is to retrieve the Windows IoT Device Service metadata and security metadata, and then combine them with the modified values in a new body to update the Windows IoT Device Service.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the Windows IoT Device Service.

parameters.name: deviceName
parameters.description: The name of the Windows IoT Device Service.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the Windows IoT Device Service. Do not specify for creating a brand new Windows IoT Device Service. Required to update an existing Windows IoT Device Service.

requestBody.description: The Windows IoT Device Service metadata and security metadata.

etag.description: The Etag field is *not* required. If it is provided in the response body, it must also be provided as a header per the normal ETag convention.

DeviceService.description: The description of the Windows IoT Device Service.

name.description: The name of the Windows IoT Device Service to check.

DeviceServiceDescriptionListResult.description: The JSON-serialized array of DeviceService objects with a next link.

nameAvailable.description: The value which indicates whether the provided name is available.

DeviceServiceNameAvailabilityInfo.description: The properties indicating whether a given Windows IoT Device Service name is available.

adminDomainName.description: Windows IoT Device Service OEM AAD domain

billingDomainName.description: Windows IoT Device Service ODM AAD domain

quantity.description: Windows IoT Device Service device allocation,

startDate.description: Windows IoT Device Service start date,

DeviceServiceProperties.description: The properties of a Windows IoT Device Service.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

details.description: A human-readable representation of the error's details.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

target.description: The target of the particular error.

operation.description: The action that users can perform, based on their permission level.

provider.description: Service provider: Azure Data Catalog Service.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed.

OperationDisplayInfo.description: The operation supported by Azure Data Catalog Service.

OperationEntity.description: The operation supported by Azure Data Catalog Service.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

value.description: List of Windows IoT Device Service operations supported by the Microsoft.WindowsIoT resource provider.

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list Windows IoT Device Service operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

ProxyResource.description: The resource model definition for a ARM proxy resource. It will have everything other than required location and tags

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource

Resource.description: The core properties of ARM resources

location.description: The Azure Region where the resource lives

TrackedResource.description: The resource model definition for a ARM tracked top level resource

DeviceNameParameter.name: deviceName
DeviceNameParameter.description: The name of the Windows IoT Device Service.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group that contains the Windows IoT Device Service.
